title: ADDIE Model-Based Science Education Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Imagery

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and educational management experience
context.additional_context: Targeting elementary education administrators/leaders in corporations, aiming to enhance the effectiveness of science education using image resources.

learning_goals: Improving the ability to develop image-based educational materials by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation).
Designing and implementing teaching methods that utilize image resources such as diagrams and infographics in science education settings.
Establishing an image-based assessment system to measure student engagement and learning outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
